There are actually other locations, the package is linux-kernel-headers.  If you installed build-essential, you'll have that package.  You can do dpkg -L linux-kernel-headers to list the files.
If you plan to compile anything, then build-essential is... essential. ;-)
dpkg -s linux-kernel-headers will give you the package blurb.
